movie.title: AfterDeath
movie.description_intro: Five young people wake up dead. Washed up by the tide they scramble to an abandoned beach house, soon realising that the perpetual night and blasts of pain suggest this is some version of hell. Between in-fighting and attacks by a demonic shadow creature, they recall the collapse of the nightclub that brought them here - and begin seeing hope of a second chance in the cabin's two mysterious paintings...
movie.description_full: Five young people wake up dead. Washed up by the tide they scramble to an abandoned beach house, soon realising that the perpetual night and blasts of pain suggest this is some version of hell. Between in-fighting and attacks by a demonic shadow creature, they recall the collapse of the nightclub that brought them here - and begin seeing hope of a second chance in the cabin's two mysterious paintings...

movies.title: Cry for the Bad Man
movies.summary: A small town widow (Camille Keaton) faces a grisly confrontation with her would-be extortionists.
movies.description_full: A small town widow (Camille Keaton) faces a grisly confrontation with her would-be extortionists.
movies.synopsis: A small town widow (Camille Keaton) faces a grisly confrontation with her would-be extortionists.

movies.title: Abrakadabra
movies.summary: In the tradition of giallos of the early 70s a magician finds himself the target of a sadistic serial killer.
movies.description_full: In the tradition of giallos of the early 70s a magician finds himself the target of a sadistic serial killer.
movies.synopsis: In the tradition of giallos of the early 70s a magician finds himself the target of a sadistic serial killer.

movies.title: The Outer Boroughs
movies.summary: Two friends, Dan and Pete, move to New York City to discover that the Outer Boroughs, while more affordable than Manhattan, are vastly haunted by all sorts of ghouls, ghosts and goblins. How can Dan and Pete handle power demons and the undead when they can barely pay the rent? Tune in to witness all the horrors that await this supernatural odd couple in...The Outer Boroughs.

movies.title: Drag Me to Hell
movies.summary: Christine Brown is a loan officer at a bank but is worried about her lot in life. She's in competition with a competent colleague for an assistant manager position and isn't too sure about her status with a boyfriend. Worried that her boss will think less of her if she shows weakness, she refuses a time extension on a loan to an old woman, Mrs. Ganush, who now faces foreclosure and the loss of her house. In retaliation, the old woman place a curse on her which, she subsequently learns, will result in her being taken to hell in a few days time. With the help of a psychic, she tries to rid herself of the demon, but faces several hurdles in the attempt.
